subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: With 15 conference tournaments tipping off this week, the pressure is on for regular-season champions in midmajor and small conferences to secure automatic berths to the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: With 15 conference tournaments tipping off this week, the pressure is on for regular-season champions in midmajor and small conferences to secure automatic berths to the N.C.A.A. tournament.
